EmailTemplate.name: 201910_Americas_MASCO_AMTC_Invitation_LL.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Visit MASCO at AMTC Tomorrow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
See you at AMTC in Atlanta Please join us... Kickoff your AMTC experience by stopping by the MASCO Service Corporation booth #446. Chat about helicopter connectivity with MASCO's Sky Connect Tracker 3A team Travis Boyer and Kevin Fraley.
Plus, make sure to stop by the Connectivity Trends Fueling the Future of Air Medical Operators presentation on Tuesday, November 5th. You'll learn about Honeywell's Sky Connect Tracker systems, HUMs products from DSI International and more!
Interested in setting up a meeting with MASCO's team? Contact Travis Boyer <[[mailto:travisboyer@mascoservice.com]]> or Kevin Fraley. <[[mailto:kevinfraley@mascoservice.com]]> If you'd like to learn more about Sky Connect Tracker Systems please visit Honeywell online <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/sites/masco-2019-campaigns]]>. DATE November 5, 2019 TIME 4:00 p.m. â€“ 4:20 p.m. LOCATION AMTC Conference Room
CC C204
